member.name: T:Volo.Abp.Uow.UnitOfWorkAttribute
member.summary: Used to indicate that declaring method (or all methods of the class) is atomic and should be considered as a unit of work (UOW).
member.remarks: This attribute has no effect if there is already a unit of work before calling this method. It uses the ambient UOW in this case.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Uow.UnitOfWorkAttribute.IsTransactional
member.summary: Is this UOW transactional? Uses default value if not supplied.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Uow.UnitOfWorkAttribute.Timeout
member.summary: Timeout of UOW As milliseconds. Uses default value if not supplied.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Uow.UnitOfWorkAttribute.IsolationLevel
member.summary: If this UOW is transactional, this option indicated the isolation level of the transaction. Uses default value if not supplied.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Uow.UnitOfWorkAttribute.IsDisabled
member.summary: Used to prevent starting a unit of work for the method. If there is already a started unit of work, this property is ignored. Default: false.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Uow.UnitOfWorkEventArgs.UnitOfWork
member.summary: Reference to the unit of work related to this event.

member.name: T:Volo.Abp.Uow.UnitOfWorkFailedEventArgs
member.summary: Used as event arguments on event.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Uow.UnitOfWorkFailedEventArgs.Exception
member.summary: Exception that caused failure. This is set only if an error occurred during . Can be null if there is no exception, but is not called. Can be null if another exception occurred during the UOW.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Uow.UnitOfWorkFailedEventArgs.IsRolledback
member.summary: True, if the unit of work is manually rolled back.
